description: Rental of beer and/or kombucha draft system for companies and individuals on Montréal's island.
rental: Want to rent one of our machines? Send us
productsInfo: Our professional dispensers are designed to chill, dispense and serve a wide range of beverages at home, garden parties, corporate parties and small commercial events, with the ability to pour up to two beverages at a time.  Perfect for enjoying a keg of kombucha as well as a keg of beer, the ideal alternative for a party with or without alcohol.

history:
Le Temps d'un fût is the story of three friends and longtime beer geeks who fell in love with Québec's microbreweries. While organizing various events, we noticed that it was very difficult to get access to high-performance beer taps and that their installation was often laborious. Aware of all three climate issues and the importance of reducing waste, we asked ourselves how our company could be environmentally responsible.
That's why we came up with the idea of offering a kegged beer distribution service to minimize the waste associated with traditional distribution. Renting a kegerator is very advantageous for several reasons.
In addition to being very economical, it allows a greater number of people to discover the wonders of the Quebec microbrewery scene.
It also allows us to promote the work of Quebec’s brewers by using professional equipment at a price accessible to all.

productGlass: Our <bold>BPA-free</bold> reusable cups allow you to <bold>lower the carbon footprint</bold> of your events
rentalDraft: <bold>Beer Dispenser Rentals</bold><cite> Our dispensers are designed to cool and serve a wide variety of beverages in a professional manner.
rentalGlass: <bold>Reusable glass rentals</bold> <cite>Lower your party's carbon footprint, no more aluminum can waste</cite>
rentalLicence: <bold>Event Permit Process</bold> <cite> Le temps d'un fut team will guide you through the regulatory and legal aspects of serving alcoholic beverages at your events.
